channel.title: CVE Feed for tsina -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for tsina -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-2970|2024-08-01T19:32:42.496Z -- tsina -- news%20wall
item.description: The News Wall plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.0. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the nwap_newslist_page() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to update the plugin's settings and modify news lists via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
